answers.answer: I would l call your OB/Midwife. It could be nothing, just dry skin, but I have heard that itching (especially on hands and feet) can be a sign of something they would be concerned about. It never hurts to call your provider. Most don't mind the questions. Good luck!

I got the same thing with my first pregnancy its an itch that won't go away I know exactly what you're feeling that's ur blood pressure it's high. Don't eat salt try to stay away from it as much as possible. Ur next step will be having preclensia n they will have to do a c section instead of having it naturally cuz ur blood pressure is too high
Thank you girls for that information i really didn't know about any of that stuff

question: Iam 34 weeks pregnant and I'm itching so bad everywhere especially  on my feet, arms, and hands its that normal??? Part of the pregnancy ??????
title: itching
